quiz.question: superb ___________
quiz.explanation: 极好的，极好的表演。The orchestra gave a superb performance of Beethoven's symphony. 管弦乐队对贝多芬交响曲进行了极好的表演。

quiz.question: curb _________
quiz.explanation: 抑制，抑制通货膨胀。The government introduced measures to curb inflation. 政府采取措施抑制通货膨胀。

quiz.question: ____ blurb
quiz.explanation: 简介，书籍简介。The book blurb on the back cover was intriguing. 封底的书籍简介很吸引人。

quiz.question: ____ cub
quiz.explanation: 幼兽，狮子幼兽。The lion cub played with its mother. 狮子幼兽和妈妈玩耍。

quiz.question: snub _______
quiz.explanation: 冷落，冷落尝试。His snub attempt to ignore her was obvious. 他冷落尝试忽视她是显而易见的。

quiz.question: pharisaic _________
quiz.explanation: 伪善的，伪善的虚伪。The politician's pharisaic hypocrisy was exposed. 政客伪善的虚伪被揭露了。

quiz.question: mosaic _______
quiz.explanation: 马赛克，马赛克图案。The ancient mosaic pattern adorned the temple floor. 古老的马赛克图案装饰着寺庙地板。

quiz.question: prosaic _____
quiz.explanation: 平淡的，平淡的风格。His prosaic style of writing lacked creativity. 他平淡的风格缺乏创造力。

quiz.question: anaerobic _________
quiz.explanation: 厌氧的，厌氧的消化。The bacteria perform anaerobic digestion. 细菌进行厌氧的消化。

quiz.question: acerbic _______
quiz.explanation: 尖刻的，尖刻的评论。Her acerbic comment silenced the room. 她尖刻的评论让房间安静下来。

quiz.question: cherubic ______
quiz.explanation: 天使般的，天使般的脸颊。The baby had adorable cherubic cheeks. 婴儿有可爱的天使般的脸颊。

quiz.question: nomadic _____
quiz.explanation: 游牧的，游牧的部落。The nomadic tribe moved with the seasons. 游牧的部落随季节迁徙。

quiz.question: sporadic _____
quiz.explanation: 零星的，零星的病例。There were sporadic cases of the disease reported. 报告了零星的病例。

quiz.question: encyclopedic _________
quiz.explanation: 百科全书式的，百科全书式的知识。He possessed encyclopedic knowledge of history. 他拥有历史的百科全书式的知识。

quiz.question: spasmodic _____
quiz.explanation: 痉挛性的，痉挛性的咳嗽。The patient had a spasmodic cough. 患者有痉挛性的咳嗽。

quiz.question: episodic ______
quiz.explanation: 情节性的，情节性的记忆。Episodic memory stores personal experiences. 情节性的记忆储存个人经历。

quiz.question: prolific ______
quiz.explanation: 多产的，多产的作家。She was a prolific writer who published dozens of books. 她是一位多产的作家，出版了几十本书。

quiz.question: horrific _____
quiz.explanation: 可怕的，可怕的场景。The accident left a horrific scene. 事故留下了可怕的场景。

quiz.question: beatific _____
quiz.explanation: 幸福的，幸福的微笑。She had a beatific smile of pure joy. 她有纯粹喜悦的幸福的微笑。

quiz.question: synergic ______
quiz.explanation: 协同的，协同的效果。The drugs had a synergic effect when combined. 这些药物结合时有协同的效果。

quiz.question: chic ______
quiz.explanation: 时髦的，时髦的装束。She wore a chic outfit to the gala. 她穿着时髦的装束参加晚会。

quiz.question: seraphic _____
quiz.explanation: 天使般的，天使般的微笑。The child's seraphic smile melted hearts. 孩子天使般的微笑融化了人们的心。

quiz.question: graphic ________
quiz.explanation: 图形的，平面设计师。The graphic designer created the company logo. 平面设计师创作了公司标志。

quiz.question: hieroglyphic ______
quiz.explanation: 象形文字的，象形文字的文字。Scholars decoded the ancient hieroglyphic script. 学者们破译了古老的象形文字的文字。

quiz.question: paleolithic ___
quiz.explanation: 旧石器时代的，旧石器时代的时代。Cave paintings date from the paleolithic era. 洞穴壁画可追溯到旧石器时代的时代。

quiz.question: neolithic ____
quiz.explanation: 新石器时代的，新石器时代的工具。Archaeologists found a neolithic tool at the site. 考古学家在遗址发现了新石器时代的工具。

quiz.question: cephalic _____
quiz.explanation: 头部的，头部指数。Anthropologists measure the cephalic index of skulls. 人类学家测量头骨的头部指数。

quiz.question: diabolic ______
quiz.explanation: 恶魔般的，恶魔般的阴谋。The villain hatched a diabolic scheme. 恶棍策划了恶魔般的阴谋。

quiz.question: bucolic _________
quiz.explanation: 田园的，田园的风景。The painting depicted a peaceful bucolic landscape. 这幅画描绘了宁静的田园的风景。

quiz.question: catholic ______
quiz.explanation: 广泛的，广泛的品味。He had catholic tastes in music. 他在音乐方面有广泛的品味。

quiz.question: vitriolic ______
quiz.explanation: 刻薄的，刻薄的攻击。The critic launched a vitriolic attack on the film. 评论家对这部电影发起了刻薄的攻击。

quiz.question: ceramic ____
quiz.explanation: 陶瓷的，陶瓷的瓷砖。The bathroom floor was covered with ceramic tile. 浴室地板铺着陶瓷的瓷砖。

quiz.question: panoramic ____
quiz.explanation: 全景的，全景的视野。The tower offered a panoramic view of the city. 塔楼提供了城市的全景的视野。

quiz.question: ___ epidemic
quiz.explanation: 流行病，流感流行病。The flu epidemic affected thousands of people. 流感流行病影响了成千上万的人。

quiz.question: ______ pandemic
quiz.explanation: 大流行病，全球大流行病。The global pandemic changed the world. 全球大流行病改变了世界。

quiz.question: endemic _______
quiz.explanation: 地方性的，地方性的疾病。Malaria is an endemic disease in tropical regions. 疟疾是热带地区地方性的疾病。

quiz.question: ______ polemic
quiz.explanation: 论战，激烈的论战。The debate turned into a heated polemic. 辩论变成了激烈的论战。

quiz.question: anemic _______
quiz.explanation: 贫血的，贫血的经济。The country suffered from an anemic economy. 这个国家遭受贫血的经济。

quiz.question: arrhythmic _________
quiz.explanation: 心律不齐的，心律不齐的心跳。The patient had an arrhythmic heartbeat. 患者有心律不齐的心跳。

quiz.question: comic _____
quiz.explanation: 喜剧的，连环漫画。She enjoyed reading the Sunday comic strip. 她喜欢阅读周日的连环漫画。

quiz.question: gnomic ______
quiz.explanation: 格言式的，格言式的格言。The philosopher offered a gnomic saying. 哲学家提供了格言式的格言。

quiz.question: hypodermic ______
quiz.explanation: 皮下注射的，皮下注射的针头。The nurse prepared the hypodermic needle. 护士准备了皮下注射的针头。

quiz.question: seismic ________
quiz.explanation: 地震的，地震的活动。Scientists monitor seismic activity near volcanoes. 科学家监测火山附近的地震的活动。

quiz.question: cosmic ____
quiz.explanation: 宇宙的，宇宙的射线。Cosmic rays bombard the Earth constantly. 宇宙的射线不断轰击地球。

quiz.question: satanic ____
quiz.explanation: 撒旦的，撒旦的邪教。The police investigated the satanic cult. 警方调查了撒旦的邪教。

quiz.question: titanic ________
quiz.explanation: 巨大的，巨大的斗争。It was a titanic struggle between good and evil. 这是善与恶之间巨大的斗争。

quiz.question: cryogenic _______
quiz.explanation: 低温的，低温的储存。The lab used cryogenic storage for samples. 实验室使用低温的储存保存样本。

quiz.question: eugenic ______
quiz.explanation: 优生的，优生的政策。The eugenic policy was controversial. 优生的政策有争议。

quiz.question: ethnic ________
quiz.explanation: 民族的，少数民族。The ethnic minority preserved their traditions. 少数民族保留了他们的传统。

quiz.question: laconic _____
quiz.explanation: 简洁的，简洁的回答。His laconic reply was just one word. 他简洁的回答只有一个字。

quiz.question: hedonic ________
quiz.explanation: 享乐的，享乐的快乐。The philosophy focused on hedonic pleasure. 这种哲学专注于享乐的快乐。

quiz.question: histrionic _______
quiz.explanation: 做作的，做作的表演。Her histrionic display was embarrassing. 她做作的表演令人尴尬。

quiz.question: chronic _______
quiz.explanation: 慢性的，慢性的疾病。Diabetes is a chronic disease requiring management. 糖尿病是需要管理的慢性的疾病。

quiz.question: platonic ____
quiz.explanation: 柏拉图式的，柏拉图式的爱。They maintained a platonic love relationship. 他们保持着柏拉图式的爱情关系。

quiz.question: embryonic _____
quiz.explanation: 胚胎的，胚胎的阶段。The project was still in its embryonic stage. 该项目仍处于胚胎的阶段。

quiz.question: runic ___________
quiz.explanation: 符文的，符文的铭文。The stone bore an ancient runic inscription. 石头上有古老的符文的铭文。

quiz.question: cynic's ____
quiz.explanation: 愤世嫉俗者的，愤世嫉俗者的观点。The cynic's view was pessimistic. 愤世嫉俗者的观点是悲观的。

quiz.question: kaleidoscopic ____
quiz.explanation: 万花筒般的，万花筒般的视野。The city offered a kaleidoscopic view of cultures. 这座城市提供了文化的万花筒般的视野。

quiz.question: microscopic ____
quiz.explanation: 微观的，微观的视野。The microscope provided a microscopic view of cells. 显微镜提供了细胞的微观的视野。

quiz.question: philanthropic ____
quiz.explanation: 慈善的，慈善的工作。She devoted her life to philanthropic work. 她一生致力于慈善的工作。

quiz.question: myopic ____
quiz.explanation: 短视的，短视的观点。His myopic view ignored long-term consequences. 他短视的观点忽略了长期后果。

quiz.question: choleric ______
quiz.explanation: 易怒的，易怒的脾气。The boss had a choleric temper. 老板有易怒的脾气。

quiz.question: generic _____
quiz.explanation: 通用的，通用的品牌。The generic brand was much cheaper. 通用的品牌便宜得多。

quiz.question: esoteric _________
quiz.explanation: 深奥的，深奥的知识。Only experts understood the esoteric knowledge. 只有专家理解深奥的知识。

quiz.question: meteoric ____
quiz.explanation: 流星般的，流星般的崛起。The young star had a meteoric rise to fame. 年轻明星流星般的崛起成名。

quiz.question: _____ rhetoric
quiz.explanation: 修辞，空洞的修辞。The politician's speech was full of empty rhetoric. 政客的演讲充满了空洞的修辞。

quiz.question: prehistoric ____
quiz.explanation: 史前的，史前的洞穴。Artifacts were found in the prehistoric cave. 在史前的洞穴中发现了文物。

quiz.question: asymmetric ______
quiz.explanation: 不对称的，不对称的设计。The building had an asymmetric design. 这座建筑有不对称的设计。

quiz.question: concentric _______
quiz.explanation: 同心的，同心的圆圈。The target had concentric circles. 目标有同心的圆圈。

quiz.question: egocentric ____
quiz.explanation: 自我中心的，自我中心的观点。His egocentric view ignored others' needs. 他自我中心的观点忽视了他人的需求。

quiz.question: gastric _____
quiz.explanation: 胃的，胃溃疡。The patient was treated for a gastric ulcer. 患者接受了胃溃疡的治疗。

quiz.question: _____ panegyric
quiz.explanation: 颂词，崇高的颂词。The speaker delivered a lofty panegyric. 演讲者发表了崇高的颂词。

quiz.question: ____ analgesic
quiz.explanation: 止痛的，口服止痛药。The doctor prescribed an oral analgesic. 医生开了口服止痛药。

quiz.question: forensic ________
quiz.explanation: 法医的，法医的证据。The forensic evidence proved his innocence. 法医的证据证明了他的清白。

quiz.question: extrinsic ______
quiz.explanation: 外在的，外在的因素。An extrinsic factor influenced the outcome. 外在的因素影响了结果。

quiz.question: emphatic ______
quiz.explanation: 强调的，强调的否认。He issued an emphatic denial of the charges. 他发表了对指控的强调的否认。

quiz.question: schematic _______
quiz.explanation: 示意的，示意的图表。The engineer drew a schematic diagram. 工程师绘制了示意的图表。

quiz.question: thematic _____
quiz.explanation: 主题的，主题的焦点。The essay lacked a clear thematic focus. 这篇文章缺乏明确的主题的焦点。

quiz.question: emblematic _______
quiz.explanation: 象征性的，象征性的姿态。The handshake was an emblematic gesture of peace. 握手是和平的象征性的姿态。

quiz.question: pragmatic ________
quiz.explanation: 实用的，实用的方法。She took a pragmatic approach to problem-solving. 她采取了实用的方法解决问题。

quiz.question: phlegmatic ___________
quiz.explanation: 冷静的，冷静的气质。His phlegmatic temperament kept him calm. 他冷静的气质让他保持冷静。

quiz.question: astigmatic ____
quiz.explanation: 散光的，散光的镜片。The optician prescribed an astigmatic lens. 验光师开了散光的镜片。

quiz.question: diplomatic _________
quiz.explanation: 外交的，外交的关系。The countries maintained diplomatic relations. 这些国家保持着外交的关系。

quiz.question: aromatic _____
quiz.explanation: 芳香的，芳香的草药。The chef used aromatic herbs in the dish. 厨师在菜肴中使用了芳香的草药。

quiz.question: chromatic _____
quiz.explanation: 半音阶的，半音阶。The musician practiced the chromatic scale. 音乐家练习半音阶。

quiz.question: achromatic ____
quiz.explanation: 消色差的，消色差的镜片。The telescope used an achromatic lens. 望远镜使用了消色差的镜片。

quiz.question: monochromatic _____
quiz.explanation: 单色的，单色的光。The laser produced monochromatic light. 激光产生单色的光。

quiz.question: somatic _____
quiz.explanation: 体细胞的，体细胞的细胞。Somatic cells contain all the organism's DNA. 体细胞的细胞包含生物体的所有DNA。

quiz.question: numismatic __________
quiz.explanation: 钱币的，钱币的收藏。The museum displayed a numismatic collection. 博物馆展出了钱币的收藏。

quiz.question: _________ fanatic
quiz.explanation: 狂热者，宗教狂热者。The religious fanatic preached on the street. 宗教狂热者在街上布道。

quiz.question: static ___________
quiz.explanation: 静电的，静电。Static electricity caused the clothes to cling. 静电让衣服粘在一起。

quiz.question: aquatic ______
quiz.explanation: 水生的，水生的植物。Aquatic plants grow in the pond. 水生的植物在池塘里生长。

quiz.question: didactic ____
quiz.explanation: 说教的，说教的故事。The didactic tale taught a moral lesson. 说教的故事传授了道德教训。

quiz.question: lactic ____
quiz.explanation: 乳酸的，乳酸。Lactic acid builds up in muscles during exercise. 运动时乳酸在肌肉中积累。

quiz.question: _______ tactic
quiz.explanation: 策略，获胜的策略。They devised a winning tactic for the game. 他们为比赛设计了获胜的策略。

quiz.question: hectic ________
quiz.explanation: 忙碌的，忙碌的日程。She managed a hectic schedule. 她应付着忙碌的日程。

quiz.question: eclectic _____
quiz.explanation: 折衷的，折衷的风格。The artist had an eclectic style. 这位艺术家有折衷的风格。

quiz.question: arctic _______
quiz.explanation: 北极的，北极的气候。The arctic climate is harsh and cold. 北极的气候严酷而寒冷。

quiz.question: antarctic ___
quiz.explanation: 南极的，南极的冰。The antarctic ice sheet is melting. 南极的冰盖正在融化。

quiz.question: ascetic _________
quiz.explanation: 禁欲的，禁欲的生活方式。The monk lived an ascetic lifestyle. 僧侣过着禁欲的生活方式。
